name: Élan Clinic
alternateName: Élan Weight Loss & Medical Longevity Clinic
description: Physician-led weight loss and medical longevity clinic in Tallinn, Estonia. Evidence-based metabolic health optimization, medically supervised weight management, and preventive medicine.

availableService.name: Physician-Supervised Weight Management
availableService.description: Medically supervised weight loss program with pharmacotherapy, nutritional programming, and longitudinal metabolic monitoring.

availableService.name: DEXA Body Composition Scan
availableService.description: Dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry for precise body composition analysis including visceral fat quantification, lean mass distribution, and bone mineral density.

availableService.name: Comprehensive Metabolic Assessment
availableService.description: Full metabolic profiling including fasting panels, HbA1c, lipid profile, inflammatory markers, hormonal panels, and resting metabolic rate measurement.

availableService.name: Concierge Physician Services
availableService.description: Direct-access primary care with extended consultations, same-day availability, and comprehensive care coordination on a retainer basis.

availableService.name: Medical Longevity Program
availableService.description: Structured longevity protocol integrating cardiovascular risk assessment, metabolic optimization, body composition management, and age-related biomarker tracking.

employee.name: Dr. Ingmar Lindström
employee.description: Family medicine specialist with 20+ years of cross-border clinical experience in Estonia and Finland. Focus on preventive medicine, metabolic health, and longevity medicine.
